name: resDate
description: Date associated with residence. Participants can contribute multiple records representing multiple time points of residential address measurement.

name: censusTract
description: Census Tract associated with residence (may have leading zeros). From NA-ACCORD GENERATE tool output.

name: zcta
description: Zip Code Tabulation Area (ZCTA). From NA-ACCORD GENERATE tool output.

name: mTractIncome
description: Median household income of census tract of residence.

name: mZCTAIncome
description: Median household income of ZCTA of residence.

name: mCountyIncome
description: Median household income of county of residence.

name: mStateIncome
description: Median household income of State of residence.

name: pTractEmployed
description: Proportion employed of census tract of residence.

name: pZCTAEmployed
description: Proportion employed of ZCTA of residence.

name: pCountyEmployed
description: Proportion employed of county of residence.

name: pStateEmployed
description: Proportion employed of state of residence.

name: pTractCollege
description: Proportion with college education of census tract of residence.

name: pZCTACollege
description: Proportion with college education of ZCTA of residence.

name: pCountyCollege
description: Proportion with college education of county of residence.

name: pStateCollege
description: Proportion with college education of state of residence.
